scenario_text.value: Oh man... Just look how beat up you are...

You did great! Thank you. I can’t believe you
fought so hard for someone like me...

Shuuji. Your desire to change yourself, and
the way you rose to the occasion...
Your noble determination made me stronger.

Thank you, Shuuji. For making this victory
possible.
So don’t talk like that... “Someone like me.”

Andiramon... Thank you so much. And let me
say again, I...
...I hope you’ll stay by my side from now on.
Yes, that I will do without question, Shuuji.
